author: Trey Alston
title: Kacey Musgraves Sent ‘Rainbow’-Colored Wishes To The World For ‘Together At Home’
description: Kacey Musgrave performed 'Rainbow' for 'One World: Together At Home' and warmed the hearts of everyone watching.
content: Kacey Musgraves's "Rainbow" video, which she dropped at the top of the last year, is a miracle of interior design. From the mood that's painted through the furniture of the desolate house, to the living room filled with beautiful flowers, the star's stirring … [+1619 chars]
